title: The Sylph
description: Sometimes, the ones closest to you are the ones you should fear the most.After surviving another face-off with Queen Sebille and discovering the truth about her past, December Thorne’s life has changed dramatically. With everyone now knowing and accepting what she truly is, and her new relationship with her mentor, her life takes a turn for the better. She finally has what she’s always wanted.But when a new face arrives at Oberon Academy, things go horribly wrong. The newcomer spills secrets best kept under wraps and every bit of the happiness she’s fought so hard for is threatened. But the troublemaker has secrets of his own.It’s up to December to figure out what he’s up to and bring it to light, so she can reclaim the happy life she’d been building—and prove he’s not the good faery he’s pretending to be.Or is he?
author: Wendi L. Wilson
